001package com.github.aecsocket.demeter.core;
002
003import com.github.aecsocket.demeter.core.factor.Factor;
004
005public record ClimateState(
006    double temperature,
007    double humidity,
008    double cloudCoverage
009) implements Factor<ClimateState> {
010    @Override
011    public ClimateState add(ClimateState other) {
012        return new ClimateState(
013            temperature + other.temperature,
014            humidity + other.humidity,
015            cloudCoverage + other.cloudCoverage
016        );
017    }
018}
